themes: competition between arts and other entertainment (sports, TV, phones)
lack of thriving cultural venues in neighborhoods
key_phrases: how do we encourage more people to support and value the arts vs. going to sports events, watching TV, or staring at their phone?
if venues were thriving in more neighborhoods, people would be curious and come out, if invited
barriers_identified: preference for other entertainment options (sports, TV, phones)
absence of thriving cultural venues in many neighborhoods
solutions_proposed: increase thriving venues in more neighborhoods
invite people to cultural events to spark curiosity
